${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:SparkleKendamaBall.NAME: Kendama Ball
${modID}:SparkleKendamaBall.FLAVOR: True skill takes a lifetime of practice.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that costs your max energy, reduce the cost of all other cards to zero for this combat.
